note.p: Education: Matriculated Trinity College, Cambridge (1648); BA (1651); Migrated to Caius College; MB (1654), MD (1659); Incorporated at Oxford (1675)
Career: Fellow, Caius College, Cambridge; Physician, Bethlem Hospital; refused to make first blood transfusion experiment on a mad Bedlam patient; died of dropsy
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Munk's Roll; Venn; Hunter
